author: The Current
description:
Members of Soul Asylum reflect on the late Conrad Sverkerson
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

During a recent video to The Current studio, the members of Soul Asylum — Dave Pirner, Jeremy Tappero and Ryan Smith — shared their thoughts on Conrad Sverkerson, the late, esteemed stage manager at First Avenue in Minneapolis. "He made everybody feel comfortable," Pirner says. Watch the full clip above.

Read more about Conrad Sverkerson at thecurrent.org: https://www.thecurrent.org/feature/2025/10/01/celebrated-first-avenue-stage-manager-conrad-sverkerson-has-died 

Musicians
David Pirner - Lead Singer 
Ryan Smith - Lead Guitar
Jeremy Tappero - Bass Player

Credits

title: Soul Asylum reminisce about Conrad Sverkerson, the esteemed stage manager at First Avenue

author: The Current
description: During his visit to The Current’s Morning Show, Obi Original gave us insight on where his Afrocentric music has taken him, and what his recent work with The Black Atlantics has meant to him.
title: Obi Original on where his Afrocentric music has taken him #afrobeats #highlifemusic #shorts
